wikipedia_page.main: Frederick Hopkinson (1 March 1922 – June 2004) was a British sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions and the 50 metre rifle, prone events at the 1956 Summer Olympics.

response: * Frederick Hopkinson (19222004), British sports shooter who competed in the 1956 Summer Olympics
